title.rendered: Minecraft available by subscription in November

content.rendered:
Minecraft will be available in Xbox Game Pass for PC in November for all subscribers in Java and Bedrock Editions.

At the Minecraft LIVE virtual event over the weekend, it was announced that Minecraft will soon be available on Xbox Game Pass for PC.

Both the Java and Bedrock Edition bundles will be available for Game Pass subscribers on PC starting November 2nd. You can control both versions on the PC at any time via a common launcher.

Thanks to cross-play, players on consoles, Windows 10 and Windows 11 can experience the popular block world together as part of their Xbox Game Pass subscriptions.

= Partner & affiliate links: Possible listed offers are usually provided with so-called affiliate links. With a purchase through one of these links you support Xboxdynasty. Without affecting the price, we receive a small commission from the provider and can offer this website to you free of charge.
